## HiddenThreeJSMaterialProperties interface

Material properties used from THREE, which may not be defined in the type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface HiddenThreeJSMaterialProperties 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [defines](./harp-materials.hiddenthreejsmaterialproperties.defines.md) | any | Used internally for material shader defines. |
|  [needsUpdate](./harp-materials.hiddenthreejsmaterialproperties.needsupdate.md) | boolean | Informs THREE.js to re-compile material shader (due to change in code or defines). |
|  [onBeforeCompile](./harp-materials.hiddenthreejsmaterialproperties.onbeforecompile.md) | CompileCallback | Defines callback available in THREE.js materials.<!-- -->Called before shader program compilation to generate vertex &amp; fragment shader output code. |
|  [transparent](./harp-materials.hiddenthreejsmaterialproperties.transparent.md) | boolean | Available in all materials in ThreeJS. |
|  [uniformsNeedUpdate](./harp-materials.hiddenthreejsmaterialproperties.uniformsneedupdate.md) | boolean | Hidden ThreeJS value that is made public here. Required to add new uniforms to subclasses of \[\[THREE.MeshBasicMaterial\]\]/\[\[THREE.MeshStandardMaterial\]\], basically all materials that are not THREE.ShaderMaterial. |
